basics.name: Amine Bensalah
basics.label: Senior iOS/macOS/Backend Swift Developer
basics.summary: Senior iOS/macOS Swift Developer with extensive experience in building high-quality applications. Skilled in Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, and Xcode, with a passion for delivering seamless user experiences. Currently seeking challenging opportunities to leverage my expertise in iOS/macOS development and contribute to innovative projects.

work.name: Netatmo
work.summary: Development and maintenance of Netatmo's Security application.
responsibilities: Development of the Security application using Swift/SwiftUI/Flux architecture
Development of additional packages for the app & the company
Development of internal tools
Collaboration with PMs and Designers on product development
Documentation setup for packages using Swift-CLI/DocC
Architecture of installation flows
achievements: Development of new features & bug fixes
Implementation of unit tests and UI tests

work.name: La Francaise Des Jeux
work.summary: Development and maintenance of the Parions Sport En Ligne & Zebet applications.
highlights: Rapid creation of the Zebet app using 97% of the Parions Sport En Ligne codebase
responsibilities: Contributed to the development of the “Parions Sport En Ligne” & “ZEbet” applications
Updated the app using Swift & Kotlin (KMM shared codebase between iOS & Android)
Developed new features using TCA (Redux), SwiftUI, Clean Architecture & modularization
Maintained the app, fixed bugs, added unit tests, and performed refactoring
Created new modules using Swift Package Manager to migrate away from the shared KMM framework

Set up technical documentation in Markdown & Docc (Code style, complex feature explanations, project onboarding, technical design with UML & Miro diagrams, ZEbet config, asset usage, CocoaPods to SPM migration, SwiftFormat)
Led technical design workshops to support and document feature updates or creation (Search bar, Modules, Scoreboard, My History)
Reviewed code via GitLab merge requests
Implemented Xcode-Gen to generate the xcodeproj and share code across ZEbet apps
Participated in the mobile team’s Agile workflow
Used Instruments to analyze memory, battery usage & network requests
achievements: Implemented Xcode-Gen to build the Zebet clone app

work.name: Le Monde Groupe
work.summary: Development and maintenance of the LeMonde app & creation of the HuffPost app.
responsibilities: Contributed to the development of Le Monde Group apps (Le Monde, La Matinale, Télérama, Courrier International, and HuffPost)
Created the *HuffPost* app
Developed new features, maintained apps, fixed bugs, and added unit tests
Built shared modules used across the group's applications
Reviewed code via GitHub pull requests
Participated in the mobile team’s Agile process

work.name: Deezer Inc
work.position: Freelance Senior iOS Developer (Swift, C & Objective-C++)
work.summary: Maintenance and development of the Deezer 360 app & Google Cast integration.
responsibilities: Integrated Google Cast into the Deezer 360 app (developed an abstraction layer with unit tests & UI tests)
Updated the Deezer Player with the SONY 360 SDK (C & Obj-C++), including unit test implementation
Contributed to the development of internal/external Deezer SDKs, implemented unit tests, heavy usage of SPM (Swift Package Manager)
Created a Sample Application to implement SDKs using SwiftUI, Combine, Dependency Injection & Clean Architecture
Reviewed code via GitHub pull requests
Worked in an international team with communication, meetings, and documentation in English

work.name: Qonto
work.summary: Maintenance and development of the Qonto app.
responsibilities: Developed new features, maintained the app, applied MVP-C Clean Architecture, fixed bugs, added unit tests and UI tests
Set up tooling: XcodeGen, Fastlane Match, Test Plans, SwiftFormat, Git Hooks, Merge Request Templates, automated changelogs, and updated CD automation via GitLab-CI
Developed iOS 14 widgets with configuration Intent
Code review through GitLab MRs
Worked on a major project within an international team, with communication, meetings, and documentation in English

work.name: Kolibree-Colgate
work.summary: Maintenance and development of the Colgate app for connected electric toothbrushes.
highlights: Created the Apple Watch app from scratch.
Implemented unit tests for Shopify API usage.
responsibilities: Developed new features, maintained the app, applied MVVM architecture with RxSwift, fixed bugs, added unit tests
Developed a fully independent Apple Watch app using SwiftUI, Combine & Redux
Built modular architecture to share code between iPhone and Apple Watch
Code review via GitHub PRs

Contributed to a major international project with team communication, meetings, and documentation in English. I learned a lot about development and teamwork. We built the Apple Watch app in one month.

work.name: VESTIAIRE COLLECTIVE
work.summary: Maintenance and development of the Vestiaire Collective app.
responsibilities: Developed a new feature (NewsFeed) using MVVM with 96% test coverage, app maintenance, updates, bug fixes, and retain cycle resolution.
Implemented best practices (coding rules with swift-lint, formatting rules with swift-format, code documentation, maintaining a GitLab wiki).
Code review via GitLab merge requests, setup of Danger to enforce rules before merging.
Updated CI/CD pipeline using Bitrise and Fastlane.
Contributed to an outstanding project with an international team, with all communication, meetings, and documentation in English.

work.name: PSA
work.summary: Implemented a car unlocking and start feature via the MyDS mobile app.
responsibilities: Led a team of iOS developers to help them improve their skills.
Established best practices to streamline developer workflow (coding standards, formatting rules, code documentation, maintaining a wiki).
Code review via GitHub PRs, pair programming, established Git rules to facilitate changelog extraction.
Set up Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment with TeamCity.
Developed the iOS application (Swift and Objective-C), maintained and debugged the app, added new features, and optimized performance.
Refactored app architecture, introduced Clean Architecture with MVVM, RxSwift & PromiseKit, Dependency Injection, Core Data caching, unit tests, and functional testing.

work.name: Allianz France
work.summary: Maintenance and development of the My Allianz Mobile app (native).
highlights: Set up a robust CI/CD pipeline
responsibilities: iOS and watchOS app development using Swift & Objective-C, maintenance and bug fixing, implementation of new features, app performance optimization.
Established a modular architecture via CocoaPods.
Implemented Clean Architecture (MVP & MVVM), added unit tests.
Updated CI/CD server using Jenkins, Fastlane, and Bitbucket.
Designed a Deeplink strategy and caching mechanism using Core Data (iOS).
Performed a full audit of the mobile app (security testing, automated deployment, unit tests, best practices, Clean Architecture, memory leak detection, etc.).

work.name: Rakuten (Price-Minister)
work.summary: Maintenance and development of the Rakuten app.
highlights: Set up modular architecture using frameworks + VIPER
responsibilities: Developed PriceMinister e-commerce iOS app (iPhone & iPad).
Created API signatures in collaboration with other teams to implement client/server connections, fully redesigned client/server communication in Swift & Alamofire.
Redesigned the visual architecture using TabBar to add new features and increase user session time.
Created reusable UI components to establish a unified and easily modifiable design system.
Implemented new architecture (MVVM & VIPER & Coordinator Pattern) to enable unit testing, added SwiftLint for clean code style and easier developer onboarding.
Performed code reviews via Bitbucket, automated app deployment on the App Store using Fastlane, and used Fabric for Beta versions.
Led daily meetings, organized demos and retrospectives.

work.name: Engie (AKKA Technologies)
work.summary: Built from scratch the connected thermostat app for Engie.
highlights: Developed the app using reactive programming
responsibilities: Developed iOS app (iPhone & iPad) called HOMNI.
Implemented pairing features with connected BLE devices.
Implemented client/server layer using AFNetworking.
Created fully native UI components (Calendar, Graphs, TabBar, remote thermostat control).
Managed mobile project with Agile methodology, coordinated with project managers from various teams.

work.name: Panda Service (DigiSchool)
work.summary: Development and maintenance of several DigiSchool applications.
responsibilities: Developed iOS applications for iPhone & iPad.
Encapsulated web applications for Apple Store integration.
Updated iOS applications (Wifi Easy Connect, Echo-Live, etc.).
Managed mobile projects using Agile methodology.
Collaborated with technical leads and project managers to track project progress.

work.name: SYNTHES’3D
work.summary: Built several mobile and web applications from scratch.
highlights: Set up backend for authentication and mobile app security
Created 3D applications from scratch to visualize products
Mobile app architecture design for iOS (iPad)
responsibilities: Analyzed client needs and wrote functional and technical specifications.
Developed iOS applications for iPhone and iPad.
Developed web applications in PHP using Symfony and CakePHP frameworks.
Developed REST web services using PHP and J2EE.
Designed databases with MySQL and SQLite.
Managed mobile and web projects using Agile, collaborating with clients and developers.

work.name: MIYOWA
work.summary: Development and maintenance of iOS mobile applications with backend.
highlights: Developed backend in PHP for mobile applications
Maintained iOS mobile application (Instant Messaging Aggregator)
responsibilities: Wrote functional and technical specifications.
Designed application architecture.
Developed mobile applications for iOS.
Integrated client-server communication.
Managed provisioning and administration in Apple Developer portal.
